${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')

LIMIT #{bidComponentDTO.pagination.firstRecordIndex},#{bidComponentDTO.recordsPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_bid_component
ac_status_code > 4
ac_status_code = 4
and ${searchKeyCp} LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{searchValueCp},'%')
